structure.unit: ESCAPES, FUGITIVES FROM JUSTICE, AND EXTRADITION

law.text: Anyone claiming a reward for the apprehension of a fugitive from justice shall be paid the amount of the reward as full compensation for all services and expenses in arresting and returning the fugitive.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 1935.
